parameters.name: RegistrationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the registration.

parameters.name: VersionNumbers
parameters.description: An array of registration version numbers. (integer) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of RegistrationVersionFilter objects to filter the results. (dict) --- The filter definition for filtering registration versions that meets a specified criteria. The name of the attribute to filter on. An array of values to filter on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to filter on.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: An array of values to filter on.

nested_items.name: RegistrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the registration.

nested_items.name: RegistrationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the registration.

nested_items.name: RegistrationVersions
nested_items.description: An array of RegistrationVersions objects.

nested_items.name: VersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the registration.

nested_items.name: RegistrationVersionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the registration.
APPROVED: Your registration has been approved.
ARCHIVED: Your previously approved registration version moves into this status when a more recently submitted version is approved.
DENIED: You must fix your registration and resubmit it.
DISCARDED: You've abandon this version of their registration to start over with a new version.
DRAFT: The initial status of a registration version after it's created.
REQUIRES_AUTHENTICATION: You need to complete email authentication.
REVIEWING: Your registration has been accepted and is being reviewed.
REVOKED: Your previously approved registration has been revoked.
SUBMITTED: Your registration has been submitted.

nested_items.name: DraftTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the draft state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: SubmittedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the submitted state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: ReviewingTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the reviewing state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: RequiresAuthenticationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the requires authentication state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: ApprovedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the approved state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: DiscardedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the discarded state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: DeniedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the denied state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: RevokedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the revoked state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: ArchivedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration was in the archived state, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: DeniedReasons
nested_items.description: An array of RegistrationDeniedReasonInformation objects.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason a registration was rejected.

nested_items.name: ShortDescription
nested_items.description: A short description of the rejection reason.

nested_items.name: LongDescription
nested_items.description: A long description of the rejection reason.

nested_items.name: DocumentationTitle
nested_items.description: The title of the document.

nested_items.name: DocumentationLink
nested_items.description: The link to the document.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. You don't need to supply a value for this field in the initial request.
